criteria: Understanding of Bullying and Harassment Effects: Assesses the student's ability to identify and explain the various effects of bullying and harassment on individuals.
Analysis of Contributing Factors: Assesses the student's ability to analyze factors that contribute to bullying and harassment.
Application of Strategies to Combat Bullying: Assesses the student's ability to apply strategies to address and combat bullying and harassment.
descriptions: Demonstrates no understanding of the effects of bullying and harassment.
Identifies only one or two basic effects of bullying or harassment.
Identifies some effects of bullying and harassment, but lacks depth in explanation.
Explains several effects of bullying and harassment with some depth, but may miss nuanced impacts.
Thoroughly explains numerous effects of bullying and harassment, including psychological, social, and emotional impacts.
Insightfully explains a comprehensive range of effects of bullying and harassment, demonstrating a nuanced understanding of their impact on victims and bystanders.
Does not identify any contributing factors to bullying and harassment.
Identifies one or two superficial contributing factors.
Identifies a few contributing factors but does not analyze their significance.
Analyzes several contributing factors with some understanding of their impact.
Analyzes the key contributing factors to bullying and harassment, explaining their complex relationships.
Critically analyzes a wide range of contributing factors, demonstrating a sophisticated understanding of the root causes of bullying and harassment.
Unable to suggest any strategies to combat bullying and harassment.
Suggests one or two ineffective or inappropriate strategies.
Suggests a few basic strategies with limited understanding of their effectiveness.
Applies several appropriate strategies to address bullying and harassment with some explanation of their potential impact.
Applies well-reasoned and effective strategies to address bullying and harassment, justifying their choices with clear explanations.
Develops innovative and comprehensive strategies to combat bullying and harassment, demonstrating a deep understanding of intervention and prevention techniques.
